title: POC Omne Eternal solar-powered helmet powers built-in lighting for endless visibility
content:
The new POC Omne Eternal is set to be the world’s first solar-powered cycling helmet, integrating its own self-powered rear lighting. Charging its internal battery under any ambient light source – indoors or outside under the sun – the Omne Eternal’s built-in lighting will always shine bright, keeping you visible whenever you ride.
